mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( user_id, pin_account_number, bank_code, account_number, product_name, account_type, balance ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{pinAccountNumber}, #{bankCode}, #{accountNumber}, #{productName}, #{accountType}, #{balance} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, pin_account_number, bank_code, account_number, product_name, account_type, balance, created_at FROM account WHERE user_id = #{userId}
